article.title: Artificial Intelligence Overview
article.para: This document provides an overview of artificial intelligence concepts.

section.title: What is Artificial Intelligence?
section.para: Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn like humans.
The term AI was first coined in 1956 by John McCarthy, who is often referred to as the father of AI.

section.title: Recent Advancements
section.para: Recent years have seen significant advancements in AI technology, particularly in the areas of deep learning and large language models.
section.definition:
A large multimodal model that can process both text and images, and generate human-like responses.
